meanings.definition: A member of a group of men trained to rescue shipwrecked sailors in rough seas.
meanings.sent1: The surfmen bravely ventured into the stormy waters to save the stranded sailors.
meanings.sent2: The surfmen were hailed as heroes for their daring sea rescues.
meanings.sent3: The surfmen joked that they were like modern-day knights, saving lives instead of damsels.
meanings.sent4: In the chaos of the tempest, the surfmen stood as beacons of hope for the sailors.
meanings.sent5: The image of the surfmen battling the raging waves stayed etched in the sailors' minds.
